Readonly objectId

objectId: string

Inherited from FluxThree.Schemas.Object3DConfiguration.objectId

  • Defined in node_modules/@youwol/flux-three/src/lib/schemas.ts:110

id of the object.

When the object is included in a scene, only one object with specific id is allowed: if one is already in the scene it is replaced.
